title: Only part of email messages in POP account are downloaded at a time
content: Hi, I have the latest version 128.1.1 but this problem has been poresent for a while. I'm downloading the messages every few days only on my POP account. When I click on Get Messages the download starts and shows 47 message to be downloaded. Then about 35-40 actually get downloaded and the process stops. I have to click on Get Messages again and the same happens again and again until all messages really hae been downloaded. How to fix it so tht I don't have to do it in small batches? Thanks
creator: mr108

title: Thunderbird Calendar: Calendar search function: Ability to search for Past Events
content: Dear Mozilla, What is your definition of a basic, standalone, digital calendar? "Search", as a basic function, is extremely limited.
creator: acmcd

title: Missing files
content:
Messages more than 30 days old have disappeared from my junk folder. I have not selected this option in settings. Where did they go? I usually get 5 to 10 junk messages a day but haven't seen any for 2 days. Where are they going?

Also, I have not sent any messages to the trash folder. My trash folder is indicating that there are an increasing number of unread messages in the folder. When I open the folder, there are no messages. Where are the messages going and how can I retrieve them.
creator: croemke

title: Thunderbird 128 selected folder styling?
content:
I'm looking for the DOM for the currently selected folder. I'd like to alter the style of the border and remove the annoying vertical bar on the left. If anyone can provide the CSS selectors I'd be grateful.

Also, if someone can point me in the direction of how to find this information for myself, that would also be cool.

Thanks in advance!
creator: ltwally1
